scripts.postinstall: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,cyan "cd backend && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i"
scripts.shell:build: export DOCKER_GROUP_ID=$(getent group docker | cut -d ':' -f 3) && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build
scripts.shell: export DOCKER_GROUP_ID=$(getent group docker | cut -d ':' -f 3) && npm run shell:build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm -u 1000 --name modellab-dev --service-ports app zsh || true && echo Stopping environment... && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.shell:stop: export DOCKER_GROUP_ID=$(getent group docker | cut -d ':' -f 3) && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend, -c green,cyan "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
